channel.title: Node on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Node on funPlantGenes

item.title: GmAP1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.16G091300 Gene Symbol: GmAP1a Gene Name: APETALA1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: APETALA1 (AP1) functions as a class A gene in the ABCE model for floral organ development, helping to specify carpel, stamen, petal, and sepal identities.

item.title: GmNAC181
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.19G108800 Gene Symbol: GmNAC181 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmNAC181 promotes symbiotic nodulation and salt tolerance of nodulation by directly regulating GmNINa expression in soybean.

item.title: GmNIN1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.04G000600 Gene Symbol: GmNIN1a Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The soybean Nodule Inception (GmNINa) gene is a central regulator of soybean nodulation.

item.title: HvSPDT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvSPDT Gene Name: SULTR-like phosphorus distribution transporter Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: A crucial role for a node-localized transporter, HvSPDT, in loading phosphorus into barley grains.
